ch0242_40_masaru/0101_0701_02_10:
I just finished cooking up a new recipe! Please try
it and tell me what you think!
ch0242_40_masaru/7101_0701_01_10:
The recipes I think up are so tasty that people
want to eat them again and again...or at least,
I hope so!
ch0242_40_masaru/7101_0701_02_10:
It’s best to only use ingredients that are easy to
get your hands on.
ch0242_40_masaru/7101_0701_03_10:
I’d be so happy if I could cook something that
anyone could make. Something that becomes a
household dish everywhere!
ch0242_40_masaru/7102_0701_01_10:
I think cooking is similar to Pokémon battles in
some ways.
ch0242_40_masaru/7102_0701_02_10:
You have to work toward your goal and think
about the steps you need to take to succeed.
ch0242_40_masaru/7102_0701_03_10:
It often doesn’t go as planned, but that’s what
makes it interesting!
ch0242_40_masaru/7103_0701_01_10:
Whenever I cook for Greedent, he always eats
up so happily that I can’t help but make more.
ch0242_40_masaru/7103_0701_02_10:
It’s not good for him to eat too much, though.
I really need to rein him in...
ch0242_40_masaru/7104_0701_01_10:
Sharing a meal has the power to bring people
together, don’t you think?
ch0242_40_masaru/7104_0701_02_10:
When I was camping back in Galar, sitting with
other folks around a pot of curry...
ch0242_40_masaru/7104_0701_03_10: I could feel us all becoming fast friends!
ch0242_40_masaru/7105_0701_01_10:
Are there any foods you don’t like,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0242_40_masaru/7105_0701_02_10:
Even ingredients you’re not fond of can go down
much more easily depending on how they’re
cooked.
ch0242_40_masaru/7105_0701_03_10:
If you do have a least-favorite food, maybe I can
change your mind about it by cooking it for you!
ch0242_40_masaru/1701_0701_01_10:
Here’s a present for you. I really put my heart
into it!
ch0242_40_masaru/1701_0702_01_10:
I wasn’t sure what to give you at first, but I’m
glad you like it!
ch0242_40_masaru/2501_0701_01_10: I haven’t always been good at cooking, you know.
ch0242_40_masaru/2501_0701_02_10:
I just wanted to help out with the household chores
and make things I like to eat, so I learned pretty
naturally.
ch0242_40_masaru/2501_0701_03_10:
I think that’s often how people steadily get better
at the things they enjoy doing.
ch0242_40_masaru/2501_0702_01_10:
There’s nothing wrong with working really hard to
be the very best...
ch0242_40_masaru/2501_0702_02_10:
but it’d be a shame if that made you start to hate
cooking.
ch0242_40_masaru/2501_0702_03_10:
I plan to take it slow and enjoy cooking to the
fullest!
ch0242_40_masaru/2511_0701_01_10: Cooking is meant to be shared!
ch0242_40_masaru/2511_0701_02_10:
So in some ways, it’s the people around the cook
who help them hone their skills.
ch0242_40_masaru/2511_0701_03_10:
That feeling of wanting to cook something that
meets their expectations is really important!
ch0242_40_masaru/2511_0702_01_10:
Cooking is a form of happiness that’s always
nearby.
ch0242_40_masaru/2511_0702_02_10:
Food is so important—we can’t live without it!
That’s why I want to get better at cooking!
ch0242_40_masaru/3001_0701_01_10:
Morning! I made breakfast. Would you like to
have some with me?
ch0242_40_masaru/3003_0701_01_10:
I prepared desserts! Let's eat some and work hard
this afternoon!
ch0242_40_masaru/3005_0701_01_10:
I like to think about cooking. I probably cook in
my dreams, too!
